description: A sophisticated, visually appealing single-page React application dedicated to showcasing premium women's pants with elegant design and smooth interactions.

'primary': { 'bg': 'bg-pink-500', 'hex': '#ec4899', 'text': 'text-white' }, 'secondary': { 'bg': 'bg-purple-500', 'hex': '#8b5cf6', 'text': 'text-white' }, 'accent': { 'bg': 'bg-rose-100', 'hex': '#ffe4e6', 'text': 'text-rose-800' }, 'neutral': { 'bg': 'bg-gray-50', 'hex': '#f9fafb', 'text': 'text-gray-900' }, 'background': { 'bg': 'bg-white', 'hex': '#ffffff', 'text': 'text-gray-800' }. Button Variants: Primary: Base: 'bg-pink-500 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold shadow-md transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out', Hover: 'hover:bg-pink-600 hover:shadow-lg hover:scale-105', Focus: 'focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-pink-300', Secondary: Base: 'bg-purple-500 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold shadow-md transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out', Hover: 'hover:bg-purple-600 hover:shadow-lg hover:scale-105', Focus: 'focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-purple-300', Tertiary: Base: 'bg-transparent border-2 border-pink-500 text-pink-500 px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out', Hover: 'hover:bg-pink-500 hover:text-white', Focus: 'focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-pink-200'. Card Styles: 'bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg border border-gray-100 p-6 md:p-8 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1'. Input Fields: 'w-full px-4 py-3 bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:border-pink-500 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-pink-100 transition-all duration-200'. Navigation: Mobile: 'fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white shadow-lg border-t border-gray-100 py-4 z-50', Desktop: 'fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-sm shadow-md border-b border-gray-100 py-4 z-50'. Footer: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-50 to-purple-50 text-gray-700 py-12 px-6 border-t border-pink-100'. Micro-interactions: Smooth scroll behavior, hover lifting effects (translate-y), opacity transitions, scale animations on interactive elements. Accessibility: High contrast ratios (WCAG AA), focus-visible utilities for keyboard navigation, aria-labels on icon buttons, prefers-reduced-motion: reduce media query to disable non-essential animations. Responsive Strategy: Mobile-first (default): Base styles for small screens. sm (640px): Tablet adjustments. md (768px): Standard desktop layout. lg (1024px): Wider containers, enhanced grids. xl (1280px): Maximum width constraints. 2xl (1536px): Ultra-wide optimizations.
architecture: State-driven single-page application with React state management handling navigation, scrolling to sections, and page transitions. No routing libraries or hash links used. Conditional rendering of section components based on navigation state in src/App.tsx.
responsiveStrategy: Mobile-first approach using Tailwind breakpoints (sm: 640px, md: 768px, lg: 1024px, xl: 1280px, 2xl: 1536px) with progressive enhancement. Base styles apply to all devices, larger breakpoints override and enhance layouts for better information density and interaction areas.
